topScorer.py.keyStrokeInfo:
def topScorer(data):
    if(data==''):
        return None
    temp=[]
    maximum=0
    d=data.splitlines()
    k=d[0].split(",")
    l=d[1].split(",")
    temp.append(k)
    temp.append(l)
    for i in range(len(temp)):
        sum=0
        for j in range(1,len(temp[i])):
            sum+=int(temp[i][j])
        if(maximum<sum):
            maximum=sum
            s=temp[i][0]
        elif(maximum==sum):
            s=s+","+temp[i][0]
    return s
            
            

data = '''\
Fred,10,20,30,40
Wilma,10,20,30
'''
assert(topScorer(data) == 'Fred')

data = '''\
Fred,10,20,30
Wilma,10,20,30,40
'''
assert(topScorer(data) == 'Wilma')

data = '''\
Fred,11,20,30
Wilma,10,20,30,1
'''
assert(topScorer(data) == 'Fred,Wilma')

assert(topScorer('') == None)
print("All test cases passed...!")
